direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve handling portfolio margin bankruptcy loans, but one is for querying records and the other for repaying.
Both methods involve operations related to portfolio margin account adjustments, though one is for asset collection and the other for loan repayment.
Both methods involve repaying debts, with similar control flows and parameter handling, though they target different types of debts (futures vs. portfolio margin).

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for sending signed requests.
Querying bankruptcy loan records before repaying can provide context and ensure the loan exists.
Both methods involve verifying the status of repayment operations, which can inform assertions about the success of repay operations.
